scripts.depcruise:graph: depcruise src --include-only '^(src)' --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > dependency-graph.html
scripts.depcruise:graph:dev: depcruise src --include-only '^(src)' --prefix vscode://file/$(pwd)/ --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html | browser
scripts.depcruise:graph:archi: depcruise src --include-only '^(src)' --config --output-type archi | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > high-level-dependency-graph.html
